nodes.name: withdrawAvailableReward
_getLatestCommitForUser

addGroupMember(address,address,MatryxPla.details: Adds a user to a group

params.user: Member to add to the group

addGroupMembers(address,address,MatryxPl.details: Adds multiple users to a group

params.users: Members to add to the group

claimCommit(address,address,MatryxPlatfo.details: Claims a hash for future use as a commit

createCommit(address,address,MatryxPlatf.details: Reveals the content hash and salt used in the claiming hash and creates the commit

params.isFork: If parent commit is being forked
params.salt: Salt that was used in claiming hash

createSubmission(address,address,MatryxP.details: Creates a commit and submits it to a Tournament

params.salt: Salt that was used in claiming hash
params.subContent: Submission title and description IPFS hash

getAvailableRewardForUser(address,addres.details: Returns the available reward for a user for a given commit

params.commitHash: Commit hash to look up the available reward

getAvailableRewardForUser(address,addres.return: Amount of MTX the user can withdraw from the given commit

getBalance(address,address,MatryxPlatfor.details: Returns commit data for the given hash

getCommit(address,address,MatryxPlatform.details: Returns commit data for the given hash

params.commitHash: Hash of the commit to return

getCommitByContent(address,address,Matry.details: Returns commit data for the given content hash

params.content: Content hash commit was created from

getSubmissionsForCommit(address,address,.details: Returns hashes of all Submissions that were made from this commit

params.commitHash: Commit hash used for the submissions

withdrawAvailableReward(address,address,.details: Withdraws the caller's available reward for a given commit

params.commitHash: Commit hash to look up the available reward
